flawed_nl_solution:
Kenny earns $525 because 35 x 15 = <<35*15=525>>525
He spends $225 on video games because 5 x 45 = <<5*45=225>>225
He has $300 left because 525 - 225 = <<525-225=3000>>3000
He can buy 60 books because 3000 / 5 = <<3000/5=600>>600
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
